getsearchjob.name: GetSearchJob
getsearchjob.description: Grants permission to get details of a search job

getsearchresultexportjob.name: GetSearchResultExportJob
getsearchresultexportjob.description: Grants permission to get details of a search result export job

listsearchjobbackups.name: ListSearchJobBackups
listsearchjobbackups.description: Grants permission to list backups in scope of a search job

listsearchjobresults.name: ListSearchJobResults
listsearchjobresults.description: Grants permission to list results of a search job

listsearchjobs.name: ListSearchJobs
listsearchjobs.description: Grants permission to list search jobs

listsearchresultexportjobs.name: ListSearchResultExportJobs
listsearchresultexportjobs.description: Grants permission to list search result export jobs

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a resource

startsearchjob.name: StartSearchJob
startsearchjob.description: Grants permission to create a search job

startsearchresultexportjob.name: StartSearchResultExportJob
startsearchresultexportjob.description: Grants permission to start an export job for an existing search job

stopsearchjob.name: StopSearchJob
stopsearchjob.description: Grants permission to stop an in-progress search job

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to tag a resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to untag a resource
